docs.title: Helpful
docs.text:
It may be helpful to install the Inject Jyutping extension. Depending on the type of browser you're using, you may use the appropriate extension to see the Jyutping on the text.

  • Chrome Web Store
  • Firefox Browser Add-On

docs.title: Description
docs.text: I'm pretty much just putting dialogs from episodes or other notes.

docs.title: Note Blocks
docs.text:
You may add note blocks via

::: underbrace
我 | I
叫 | called
做 | (emphasis)
:::

which will be rendered as

docs.title: Tools Used
docs.text: For this repository, I'm using MkDocs to render the information in the Markdown files. I'm using the Material theme.

docs.title: Beyond - Really Love You [真的愛你]
docs.text:
作詞：小美(梁美薇) 作曲：黃家駒

無法可修飾的一對手

帶出溫暖永遠在背後

縱使囉嗦始終關注

不懂珍惜太內疚

沉醉於音階她不讚賞

母親的愛卻永未退讓

決心衝開心中掙扎

親恩終可報答

春風化雨暖透我的心

一生眷顧無言地送贈

是你多麼溫馨的目光

教我堅毅望著前路

叮囑我跌倒不應放棄

沒法解釋怎可報盡親恩

愛意寬大是無限

請准我說聲真的愛你

(重唱*)

仍記起溫馨的一對手

始終給我照顧未變樣

理想今天終於等到

分享光輝盼做到

(重唱#)

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
Peppa: 我叫做Peppa

::: underbrace 我 | I 叫 | called 做 | (emphasis) :::

::: underbrace 叫做 | "He/She is called..." :::

This portion is Peppa introducing herself but providing an emphasis as if it was 3rd person. Or as if she was braking the 4th wall

Peppa: 而佢就係我細佬George

::: underbrace 而 | a more formal version of 同 佢 就係 | "just is" 我 細佬 | colloquial version of younger brother George :::

Peppa: 佢就係豬太太

::: underbrace 佢就係 豬 | pig 太太 | Mrs. :::

Peppa: 佢係豬先生

::: underbrace 佢係豬 先生 | Mr. :::

Peppa: 我係Peppa

docs.title: Episode
docs.text:
(It's raining outside)

Narrator: 因為今日落雨, 所以Peppa同George唔可以出去玩啊

::: underbrace 因為 | because 今日 | today 落雨 | rain (v) (落 | fall 雨) | rain :::

::: underbrace 所以 | therefore Peppa 同 | and George 唔可以 | can't 出去 | go out 玩 | play 啊 | (end particle) :::

(Stops raining)

Peppa: 爹哋，外面停雨喇

::: underbrace 爹哋, | Daddy 外面 | outside 停雨 | stop raining (停 | stop 雨) | rain 喇 | (end particle) :::

Peppa: 我哋可唔可以出去玩啊？

::: underbrace 我哋 | We 可唔可以 | can/cannot 玩啊？ :::

Dad: 噉好啦，你哋出去玩啦

::: underbrace 噉好啦 | Well, (噉 | very 好 | good 啦) | (end particle) 你哋 出去 玩啦 :::

(Kids run outside to play. Peppa jumps into a puddle)

Narrator: Peppa好鍾意跳落啲泥氹度㗎

::: underbrace Peppa 好 | really 鍾意 | like 跳落 | jump into (跳 | jump 落) | downward 啲 | (pl. classifier) 泥氹 | puddle 度 | (location) 㗎 :::

Peppa: 我好鍾意泥氹㗎

(Mom walks out with boots)

Mom: Peppa！

Mom: 你要跳落泥氹嘅話, 就要着咗水鞋先得㗎

::: underbrace 你 要 | want 跳落 泥氹 嘅話 | If you want :::

::: underbrace 就要 | then you have to 着 | wear 咗 | ? 水鞋 | rain boot 先得 | do it first 㗎 :::

Peppa: 對唔住啊

::: underbrace 對唔住 | Sorry 啊 :::

Comes from 对不起 which comes from "I can't compare to you"

::: underbrace 隊冧佢 | take care of him (kill him) (隊 | poke 冧 | collapse 佢) :::

Narrator: George都好鍾意跳落啲泥氹度㗎

::: underbrace George 都 | also 好鍾意 | really likes 跳落啲泥氹度㗎 :::

Peppa: George啊！如果你要跳落泥氹度, 就一定要着水鞋㗎

::: underbrace George啊！ 如果 | if 你要跳落泥氹度 :::

::: underbrace 就 | then 一定 | must (定) | constraint 要着水鞋㗎 :::

Narrator: Peppa好鍾意照顧佢細佬George

::: underbrace Peppa 好鍾意 照顧 | take care (照 | shine upon 顧) | look at 佢 細佬 George :::

(George goes away and returns wearing boots. Kids play more)

Peppa: George，我哋再去揾多啲泥氹吖

::: underbrace George, 我哋 再 | repeat 去 | go 揾 | search for 多啲 | more of 泥氹 吖 :::

(Kids go to other puddles)

Narrator: Peppa同George玩得好開心啊

::: underbrace Peppa同George 玩得 | play (玩 | play 得) | able (makes a verb intransitive) 好 開 | open 心啊 :::

Narrator: Peppa揾到個好細嘅泥氹 而George就揾到個大泥氹

::: underbrace Peppa 揾到 | found (揾 | search 到) | completed 個 好細 | very small 嘅 | (possessive) 泥氹 ::: ::: underbrace 而George 就 | then 揾到 | found 個大泥氹 :::

(Kids play more.)

Peppa: George，睇下

::: underbrace George， 睇下 | look there (睇 | look 下) | down :::

Peppa: 嗰邊有個好大嘅泥氹啊

::: underbrace 嗰邊 | there 有個 | (have no have) 好大嘅泥氹啊 :::

(Kids go see huge puddle)

Narrator: George好想第一個跳入大泥氹度喎

::: underbrace George 好想 | really want 第一 | first 個 跳入 | jump in (跳 | jump 入) | enter 大泥氹度 喎 | (end particle) :::

(George tries to jump in, but Peppa grabs him before he does so)

Peppa: 等陣啊，George

::: underbrace 等陣 | wait 啊，George :::

Peppa: 我要幫你試下係咪安全先啊

::: underbrace 我 要 | need 幫 | help 你 試下 | try/test 係咪 | is isn't 安全 | safe 先 | first 啊 :::

(Peppa jumps in and, unaware, splashes mud on George's face)

Peppa: 好嘢，呢度安全喇

::: underbrace 好嘢 | Hooray! 嘢 | thing ， 呢度 | here 安全喇 :::

(Geoge starts crying)

Peppa: 對唔住啊，不過係泥嚟㗎咋

::: underbrace 對唔住啊， 不過 | but 係泥嚟㗎咋 :::

(George's mood improves, and jumps in, splashing mud on Peppa)

Narrator: Peppa同George真係好鍾意跳落泥氹度玩㗎

::: underbrace Peppa同George 真係 | really 好 | really 鍾意跳落泥氹度玩㗎 :::

(Kids are now covered in mud)

Peppa: 快啲嚟啦，George

::: underbrace 快啲 | quickly (快) | fast 嚟 | come 啦，George :::

Peppa: 我哋而家要去畀嚟爹哋睇下啊

::: underbrace :::

(Kids run home, dirty and find Dad in kitchen, after leaving trail of mud behind)

Dad: 你哋唔係𠻺嘛？

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 爹哋…你估下我哋做過啲咩嚟吖

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 等我估下先

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 你哋頭先去咗睇電視？

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 唔係啊，爹哋

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 你哋啱啱沖完涼？

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 唔係

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 噉我知喇，你哋頭先跳咗落泥氹度

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 冇錯啊，爹哋

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 我哋頭先跳咗落泥氹度啊

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 睇下你兩個幾污糟吖

::: underbrace :::

(Kids notice trail they left behind)

Dad: 唔緊要啦，係泥嚟啫

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 喺媽咪睇到之前，快啲抹乾淨佢

::: underbrace :::

(Dad rubs sponge on George's face)

Peppa: 爹哋，抹乾淨之後

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 你同媽咪會唔會同我哋一齊玩㗎？

::: underbrace :::

Dad: 會啊，我哋可以喺花園一齊玩

::: underbrace :::

(Whole family starts walking outside)

Narrator: Peppa同George着咗水鞋

::: underbrace :::

Narrator: 豬太太同豬先生亦着咗水鞋

::: underbrace :::

(Peppa starts jumping on puddle, as family approaches to join.) Narrator: Peppa鍾意喺泥氹度跳上跳落

::: underbrace :::

Narrator: 大家都好鍾意喺泥氹度跳上跳落

::: underbrace :::

(Whole family starts jumping on puddle. Dad slips and falls on puddle)

Mom: 哎吔，爹哋啊，睇下你而家幾污糟吖

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: 都只係泥嚟啫

::: underbrace :::

(Whole family joins in and start rolling on puddle.)

(End.)

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Peppa: 我叫做Peppa Peppa: 而佢就係我細佬George Peppa: 佢就係豬太太 Peppa: 佢係豬先生 Peppa: 我係Peppa

docs.title: 恐龍先生不見了
docs.text:
(Whole family is spending time in living room)

Narrator: George最鍾意嘅玩具就係恐龍先生

George: 恐龍

Narrator: George好鍾意恐龍先生㗎

Narrator: 有時候George會用恐龍先生嚟嚇Peppa

(Peppa and George play with toy outside)

(George chases Peppa with dinosaur)

Peppa: 我好驚啊！

(Family eats meal on dinner table)

Narrator: 食飯嗰陣，恐龍先生會坐喺George隔籬

Mom: 頭先係邊個urk啊？到底係George你吖？定係恐龍先生啊？

George: 恐龍

(Mom gives George a bath)

Narrator: 沖涼嗰陣George都會同恐龍先生一齊沖㗎

(Kids go to bed)

Mom: 早唞喇，Peppa

Peppa: 早唞，媽咪

Mom: 早唞喇，George. 早唞喇，恐龍先生

Narrator: 當George瞓覺嗰陣,恐龍先生會瞓喺佢隔籬

(George goes play outside)

Narrator: George最鍾意玩嘅遊戲係將恐龍先生拋上半空

Narrator: 然後等佢跌落嚟嗰陣，接返住佢

(Peppa and parents are spending time in living room, where Peppa and Dad are playing a checkers game)

Narrator: Peppa同豬先生喺度捉緊棋喎

(Peppa wins checkers game with Dad)

Peppa: 我贏咗喇，爹哋

Dad: 噢，做得好啊，Peppa

(George walks in crying)

Dad: 咩事啊，George？

Mom: George，發生咩事啊？

George: 恐龍

Dad: George，你係唔係唔見咗恐龍先生啊？

Narrator: George唔見咗恐龍先生啊

Mom: 唔使擔心，George. 我哋會揾返恐龍先生㗎

Dad: 係時候到偵探出馬喇

Peppa: 爹哋，到底乜嘢係偵探啊？

Dad: 其實所謂偵探就係一個非常擅長. 揾返失物嘅人啊

Peppa: 我係偵探！我好擅長揾失物㗎

Dad: 噉好啦，就由Peppa做偵探啦

Peppa: George，我就係偵探喇. 我會幫你揾返恐龍先生㗎喇

Dad: 係噉，你身為偵探就要問George幾個簡單問題先

Peppa: George呀，恐龍先生而家喺邊度啊？

(George cries)

Narrator: George唔知恐龍先生去咗邊度喎

Dad: 偵探可以估下恐龍先生會放喺邊度㗎

Peppa: 我諗到喇，我知佢喺邊喇

(Peppa goes upstairs. Whole family goes to the bathtub)

Peppa: George成日都帶埋恐龍先生一齊沖涼㗎. 所以恐龍先生會喺浴缸入面

Narrator: 恐龍先生唔喺浴缸入便喎

Peppa: 我諗到喇，我知恐龍先生喺邊喇

(Whole family goes to kids bedroom)

Peppa: George成日都要恐龍先生; 每晚都陪佢瞓覺㗎

Peppa: 所以佢一定喺張牀度

Narrator: 恐龍先生亦都唔喺George張牀度喎

Mom: 可能…我哋要去花園度揾下喎

Peppa: 係啊，花園啊. 我都諗住講㗎喇

(Whole family goes outside)

Peppa: 究竟恐龍先生喺邊度啊？

Narrator: 恐龍先生真係好難揾啊

(Family approaches area where George was playing, which is next to a tree)

Peppa: 度度都揾唔到恐龍先生啊

Dad: George呀，你咪好鍾意將恐龍先生拋上天𠸏？

Dad: 唔知道今次你係咪將恐龍先生拋得太高呢？

(Family sees toy on tree branch)

Peppa: 喺嗰度啊！恐龍先生啊！我見到先㗎！

Dad: 做得好啊，Peppa. 你真係一個好犀利嘅偵探啊

(Dad gets toy from tre branch)

George: 恐龍

Narrator: George好開心可以揾得返恐龍先生啊

(George happily plays by throwing dinosaur up and down)

Dad: 我諗…你以後都唔好喺樖樹隔籬拋恐龍先生喇

(Whole family laughs.)

George: 恐龍

(End)
